A related disorder called Maffucci syndrome also involves multiple enchondromas but is distinguished by the presence of red or purplish growths in the skin consisting of tangles of abnormal blood vessels (hemangiomas).",GHR,Ollier disease
How many people are affected by Ollier disease ?,"Ollier disease is estimated to occur in 1 in 100,000 people.",GHR,Ollier disease
